name: Matt Antoine
description:
Controls: 
W - Forward
A -Left
S - Backward
D - Right
E - Action

Mouse -Look around

Instructions:
 You are stuck in an abandoned area so you must find the  correct skull button
 to unlock the door and get through before it closes.
 Make your way up to the platform that will get you out. Good Luck :)
 May We All Suffer In Silver Elo..
